paragraphs.text:
%spark
import org.apache.spark.{SparkConf, SparkContext}
import org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession
import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{StructType, StructField, StringType}

val schemaString = "year state state_po state_flips state_cen state_ic office candidate party_detailed writein candidates_votes total_votes version notes party_simplified"
val patient1 = sc.textFile("/data/Project1Data_SampleData.csv")
val schema = StructType(schemaString.split(" ").map(fieldName => StructField(fieldName, StringType,true)))
val rowRDD= patient1.map(_.split(",")).map(p=> Row(p(0), p(1), p(2), p(3), p(4),p(5),p(6),p(7),p(8),p(9),p(10),p(11),p(12),p(13),p(14)))
val candidatesDF = sqlContext.createDataFrame(rowRDD, schema)
candidatesDF.createOrReplaceTempView("candidates")

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql
SELECT year, candidate, party_detailed, candidates_votes, total_votes FROM candidates WHERE state = "OHIO" AND (party_detailed="DEMOCRAT" OR party_detailed="REPUBLICAN")

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]
